titleStmt.title: A coppie of the proclamation made by the illustrous Infanta Isabella Clara Eugenia, soueraigne princesse of the Netherlands, and the Countie of Burgundie Touching the defence, interdiction and restraint of all communication, dealing and trafficke with Holland, Zeland and their adherents. Faithfully translated out of the printed copie, printed at Antwerpe.
Proclamations. 1599 Feb. 9
titleStmt.author: Netherlands. Sovereign (1598-1621 : Albert and Isabella).
Isabel Clara Eugenia, Infanta of Spain, 1566-1633.

titleStmt.title: A coppie of the proclamation made by the illustrous Infanta Isabella Clara Eugenia, soueraigne princesse of the Netherlands, and the Countie of Burgundie Touching the defence, interdiction and restraint of all communication, dealing and trafficke with Holland, Zeland and their adherents. publicationStmt.publisher: By [Edward Allde for] Iohn Wolfe, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes head Alley, neere the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen .. the ix. of Februarie, 1599.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
